Name: Xevious
Overview: Control your Solvalou ship and destroy the XEVIOUS forces! Use blasters against air-based enemies and bombs against ground-based targets. Destroy And or Genesis to earn bonus points! Unique enemies, interesting BGM, a variety of scrolling background environments and many hidden gameplay features differentiated XEVIOUS from other shooting games released at the time. XEVIOUS was released in 1982 and became an instant classic.
